description: Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission Ref: P1364.23 dated 12/06/2024 to allow for amendments to materials and existing and proposed kerb alterations (Demolition of the existing building with the construction of a two storey building with roof level accommodation to provide 9 apartments (1 No. x 3 bedroom & 8 No. x 2 bedroom) with private and communal amenity spaces, on-site parking, new boundary wall with cycle and bin storage.)
decision_conditions: The amendments sought with respect to the design features are considered to be noticeably different from the approved scheme and would affect the character of the development previously approved and cannot be regarded as a minor amendment.
The submission of a fresh planning application under section 73 is therefore deemed necessary in this case.
